rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0001
rows.name: Oh! Look at the size of this crevasse!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0002
rows.name:
Who'd have thought Genbu Drifts
would be so high up?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0003
rows.name: Say, how do you think it formed?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0004
rows.name: How should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0005
rows.name:
I heard from Gramps that someone
made it by punching the ground.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0006
rows.name: Maybe the Divine Beast moved?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0007
rows.name: How should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0008
rows.name: Maybe someone punched the ground?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0009
rows.name: Maybe the Divine Beast moved?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0010
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0011
rows.name:
Perhaps someone punched the ground?
I have heard talk of such things...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0012
rows.name: Perhaps the Divine Beast moved?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0013
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0014
rows.name: I reckon someone punched the ground!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0015
rows.name: I reckon the Divine Beast moved!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0101
rows.name: What, really?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0102
rows.name:
It'd never happen if I'd used
Cold Judgment.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0103
rows.name:
You're saying my power isn't up
to scratch? Guess there's always
someone stronger, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0105
rows.name: Why the silent treatment?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0106
rows.name: Hold on, was that meant to be a joke?!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0107
rows.name:
I'm a straightforward sort of Blade.
Don't go confusing me with your
strange sense of humor.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0108
rows.name:
Still, if I had the power to create rifts
like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0201
rows.name:
We'd be right in the middle of
Genbu right about now.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0202
rows.name:
Divine Beasts must generate a massive amount
of energy as they move.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0203
rows.name:
Makes sense, considering how
enormous their bodies are.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0204
rows.name:
If I could gain the strength to rival
a Divine Beast's in motion...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0301
rows.name:
I would be able to crush evil where it
spawns with a flaming fist of justice!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0302
rows.name: Wouldn't that be glorious?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0303
rows.name:
Good to see you're still as peppy as
ever, Glen.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0304
rows.name:
Good to see you're as intense as
always, Glen.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0305
rows.name:
I see you're still as spirited as ever,
Glen.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0306
rows.name:
Glad to see you're as fiery as ever,
Glen!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0307
rows.name:
But of course! The world may change,
but my heart and my fists remain
constant!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0308
rows.name:
To save a person is to save them
from their own weak selves.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0309
rows.name:
If I failed, then my whole
existence would be meaningless!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0310
rows.name:
No, my heart and my fists forge ever
onwards, burning with justice!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0311
rows.name:
But your fists are made of ice, aren't
they?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0312
rows.name:
Uhm, aren't your fists made of ice,
though?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0313
rows.name:
It only just struck me now, but aren't
your fists made of ice, not fire?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0314
rows.name:
They're burning all right, but looking
closely, isn't that ice?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0315
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0316
rows.name: ...Wait, hold on a moment.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0317
rows.name: You're right... Why are they ice?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0318
rows.name:
It's weird that I'd be using
anything other than fire...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0319
rows.name:
I'm always burning with passion, after
all! What the heck?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0320
rows.name:
Uh, I'm not really the best person to
ask...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0321
rows.name:
Uh, I'm not really the best person to
ask...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0322
rows.name:
I'm afraid that's something I can't
answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0323
rows.name: Heck if I know...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0324
rows.name: All right. There's only one answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0325
rows.name: Listen carefully, Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0326
rows.name:
My fists are not made of ice. They
are blue flames!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0327
rows.name:
You see? You can make out the outline
and everything! Mystery solved! Done!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0328
rows.name:
You get it? They're blue flames!
Flames! You got that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0329
rows.name: Bit of a stretch, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0330
rows.name: Kind of a stretch, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0331
rows.name:
Comparing you to Kagutsuchi, I think
that's something of a stretch...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0332
rows.name:
Honestly, mate, that's a bit of
a stretch...

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0333
rows.name:
I don't care! From a distance, they
look like flames,okay?!

rows.label: kizunatalk056_msg0334
rows.name:
Good! From now on, you may address
me as Glen of the Blue Flame!
